front.title: Clarifications for Elliptic Curve Cryptography Subject Public Key Information

abstract.t: This document updates RFC 5480 to specify semantics for the keyEncipherment and dataEncipherment key usage bits when used in certificates that support Elliptic Curve Cryptography.

section.name: Introduction
section.t: specifies the syntax and semantics for the Subject Public Key Information field in certificates that support Elliptic Curve Cryptography. As part of these semantics, it defines what combinations are permissible for the values of the key usage extension . specifies 7 of the 9 values; it makes no mention of the keyEncipherment and dataEncipherment key usage bits. This document corrects this omission by updating to make it clear that neither keyEncipherment nor the dataEncipherment key usage bits are set for key agreement algorithms defined therein. The additions are to be made to the end of .
